christmas.title: Christmas Event 2025
christmas.subtitle: Join us for a festive celebration this Christmas!
christmas.battlepass.title: Christmas Battle Pass
christmas.info.stars.description: There are 3 weeks, each one of them gives you 50 Stars when completing the whole week. A total of 150 Stars are available for free.
christmas.info.workshop.description: The BattlePass has it's own workshop where you can craft unique candies and gifts, all of the resources are farmable.
christmas.info.small.description: Opened directly for rewards with a right-click, or Used to craft Medium Gifts.
christmas.info.medium.description: Contain surprises of their own, or Used to craft Big Gifts.
christmas.info.big.description: Contain huge surprises like exclusive items, mounts, pets and more!
christmas.treasure.title: Christmas Treasure (Big Red Present)
christmas.treasure.description1: Like every events on Minebox, this treasure is obtainable for FREE by crafting it with candies and gifts or by exchanging Vote Points for Pass Stars
christmas.treasure.description2: Exclusive Hipster Santa armor set, The Hipster Penguin, The Snowman, The Hipster Bike, The Wooden Plane
christmas.treasure.description3: 1 Big Red Present = 15 Battle Pass Stars
